OOC: What?  Um....No, never had a character named Nitro or Hell Demon.  But=
 in HD, the H does represent Hell...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From=
: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 12, =
2001 5:39 PM
  Subject: Re: Remember Them........


  OOC: Ummm...Nitro and=
 Hell Demon?...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
 =
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tuesday, June 12, 2001 5:24 PM
   =
 Subject: Remember Them........


    OOC: Try to guess who they are everyb=
ody, from the first letters of their names.....(Legendarynemasis and Yansho=
sh, you guys know, so don't tell!)
    ::N/HD::

         A bat hovered in =
the air with his wings, and along side him, a black, armoured-cyborg horse,=
 their shadows seemed to loom over the CF.

         "Bro, we made it back.=
  It seems so long.  I'm glad we defeated that creep.....I think...." HD sa=
id to her brother N.

         "Yes, we have made it back to the Cybertroni=
an Fire, sister.  Shall we see how the world has changed since we were gone=
 from civilization?" N suggested.

          HD nodded her head.  They both=
 continued getting closer to the CF.  They both transformed to robot mode.
=
